features: Eco-friendly Non-Stick Ceramic Coating & Super Easy to Clean - Our grill pan interior is coated by non-stick ceramic coating, SGS approved, 100% PFOA free. Require less oil or butter for cooking and minimal scrubbing for a spotless clean, giving you a healthier and more enjoyable at-home cooking experience.

Widely & Easy to Use - Perfect for bacon, steaks, grill cheese, browning onions and more. The parallel ridges channel the grease to the sides, it allows to get grill marks on your food with great grill lines, double pour spouts makes it easier to drain excess oil, and the heat resistant bakelite handle are suitable for grasping and staying cooling while cooking. Time to upgrade your pots and pans and spruce up your kitchen decor!

Compatible with All Stovetops - Design with perfect magnetized base makes it rapid heat transfer and long-time use, used effectively on gas, ceramic, electric, and induction stove tops, made for any kitchen and cooktop, an ideal replacement solution for your aging, worn out, or failed cooking equipment.

Sturdy & Durable Body - The advanced die-cast aluminum technology, combined the advantage of cast-iron and traditional riveted cookware, conducts heats quickly & evenly, the thicken induction compatible bottom provides a stable heat distribution during cooking, rapidly heating up, saves time and energy.

Service & Guarantee - ESLITE LIFE Cookware Store 100% passes strict multi inspection process. In case you receive defect items caused by delivery or If any problems while using our product, please feel free to contact us, you will be guaranteed to get 100% refund or new replacement. Really appreciate your trust and ordering!
body.description: SAFE ESLITE LIFE crepe pan is free of any toxins, and 100% PFOA, LEAD, CADMIUM free. NONSTICK GRANITE COATING Nonstick granite coating to ensure excellent nonstick performance, making cooking easier and cleanup. EASY TO CLEAN Nonstick interior stands up to everyday use and keeps food sliding smoothly along the surface, making cooking easier and cleanup. PREMIUM CASTING ALUMINUM Made of casting aluminum that provides break resistant and does not warp which ensures its durability and longevity. HEATS QUICKLY & EVENLY 3 layers thicken induction compatible bottom provides a stable heat distribution during cooking, rapidly heating up, saves time and energy, 5 layers thicken aluminum body appropriate weight and heat conductive can ensure uniform heat dissipation and prevent hot spots. HEAT RESISTANT BAKELITE HANDLE Ergonomic bakelite handle are suitable for grasping and staying cooking while cooking. Suitable handle lengths, and curved radians which is able to help you master your cooking. The tightened stainless steel rivet ensures the stability of the omelette pan. SUITABLE FOR STOVE ESLITE LIFE nonstick dose pan is perfectly suitable for gas, ceramic, electric, halogen or induction stoves. NOTICE Low to medium heat is recommended. Wooden or silicone utensil is recommended. Oven and dishwasher are not applicable. Please use sponge or soft scouring pad to clean . AFTER-SALE SERVICE If you receive this pancake pan with any damage or if it malfunctions in any way, please free free to contact us, we will reply to you within 24 hours to address your concern.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great grill pan
reviews.reviewText: Wow this works great. Cooks evenly and clean up is super easy. Wipes clean with ease. Buy it you won't regret it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great grilling plate
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a substitute for a cast iron grill plate. Same size, same pattern on both front and back as my cast iron griddle... HOWEVER, this aluminum grill plate has a non-stick surface that makes cleaning a breeze PLUS I don't need to worry about seasoning the surface or rust. No "hot-spots" since the plate conducts heat evenly, and it allows me to char the steak's surface quickly for "black and blue", char-rare, or blackened Cajun Style. I'll get several more for my RV and for Christmas gifts! Well worth the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great grill pan
reviews.reviewText: Great size. Perfect for a piece of tuna steak. Cooks great. Cleans great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Could be better
reviews.reviewText: Over used this a few times and so far, not impressed with the pour spots. The grease that I was pouring out simply rolled to the side and bottom to burn. A small spout form would have been better. Otherwise, it’s so far nonstick with a strong handle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Looks great and works great. Heats up evenly and food slides right off. Super easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the pan! Lightweight, grill marks are great, easy to clean and useful accessories! Absolutely worth the price. Don’t hesitate!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just the right size and easy to clean
reviews.reviewText: Great pan for grilling meat indoors. The 11 inch pan works very good for bacon. I also like how easy it is to clean up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works and tastes just like from the grill!
reviews.reviewText: Product came as described, putting it together was easy as well. It’s just the handle, you will need a screwdriver though. Made burgers as the first use of it and it cooked well. Looked like burgers off the grill lol. Anyway, it was good and I recommend getting if you don’t have a grill or just want good burgers!
La tapa esta mas grande y defectuosa, no encaja en la sarten. !!!
Product is good but be aware to comes disassembled. First time ever I have to assemble a pot to use.

Me encanto este sarten-grill, la calidad es superior , el mango de madera esta super bonito y lo que estba buscando es que no fuera demasiado grande, el tamaño es perfecto especialmente si tu cocina no es tan grande. No se pega para nada y es facil de limpiar

reviews.reviewTitle: Para mi es muy practico y si cumple mis espectativas.
